alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued June 13 at 2:28AM PDT until June 14 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Southeastern Elko County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 8 PM PDT this evening. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
